meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on; (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await; (고대하다) look forward to

vlive.korean: 기다리고. And wait for her. 듣기 View video Chi Pu : [Công chiếu trước] Chi Pu's Web Drama "WAKE UP" Last EP
[범뀨 기다리고 있눈데 왜 안 보여주떼여?] 왜 안 보여주세요? [BEOMGYU is waiting, where's the phrase?] Where's the phrase? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: [BEOMGYU is waiting, where's the phrase?] Where's the phrase?

vlive.korean: [밖에서 기다리고 있던 좀비들] [우리 살려줘...] [Zombies waiting outside] [Save us...] View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY “TIME TO TWICE” – 대탈출 EP.03
아직 안 나와서 지금 되게 많이 기다리고 계시는 분들이 많은데 이제... It didn't come out yet... There are many of you who will be waiting... 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 퇴근전 잠시 비춥니다..
vlive.english: It didn't come out yet... There are many of you who will be waiting...

vlive.korean: 배달원 분이 기다리고 계시대요 - 그럼 시즈니보다 밥이 중요한 건가요? and the delivery guy is waiting for us. - Does that mean food is more precious than our NCTzen? 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만😆😆💚
vlive.english: and the delivery guy is waiting for us. - Does that mean food is more precious than our NCTzen?

examples.korean: A hooded figure waited in the doorway. 발음듣기 복면을 한 사람이 문간에서 기다리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A hooded figure waited in the doorway. 발음

examples.korean: The truck driver was waiting to unload. 발음듣기 그 트럭 운전사는 짐을 내리기 위해 기다리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The truck driver was waiting to unload. 발음

examples.korean: Someone was waiting in the shadowy doorway. 발음듣기 어떤 사람이 어둑어둑한 문간에서 기다리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Someone was waiting in the shadowy doorway. 발음

examples.korean: After an hour of waiting, tempers began to fray. 발음듣기 한 시간 동안 기다리고 나자 사람들이 성질들이 나기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After an hour of waiting, tempers began to fray. 발음

examples.korean: Congress is waiting to see how the Oval Office will react. 발음듣기 의회는 (미국) 정부가 어떤 반응을 보일지 기다리고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Congress is waiting to see how the Oval Office will react. 발음
